text: If you look at what you have in life, you’ll always have more. If you look at what you don’t have in life, you’ll never have enough.
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare

text: Success is the ability to go from one failure to another with no loss of enthusiasm
author: Winston Churchill

text: Fortune knocks at every man’s door once in a life, but in a good many cases the man is in a neighbouring saloon and does not hear her.
author: Mark Twain

text: I try more and more to be myself, caring relatively little whether people approve or disapprove.
author: Van Gogh

text: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world.
author: Albert Einstein

text: The scariest moment is always just before you start.
author: Stephen King

text: I’m not upset that you lied to me, I’m upset that from now on I can’t believe you.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

text: If my mind can conceive it, and my heart can believe it — then I can achieve it.
author: Muhammad Ali

text: The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth he acquires, but in his integrity and his ability to affect those around him positively.
author: Bob Marley
